services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

experiences.description: Led the development of product and manufacturing pages from scratch, integrating backend functionalities with Figma designs to elevate user experience. Enhanced code quality and performance by creating global components for maintainability. Collaborated with leadership to build a comprehensive end-to-end dashboard, solving critical business challenges. Spearheaded the implementation of a product CMS from scratch in Next.js.

Took full ownership of developing and optimizing key features, including training pages, a cutting-edge Training CMS, and a seamless Payment Page with Razorpay/Stripe integration. Achieved an 80% reduction in content update time, slashed build time by over 60%, and enhanced performance by streamlining code and implementing lazy loading and caching strategies. These optimizations resulted in a significantly faster and more engaging user experience.

Enhanced user experience with dynamic animations and micro-interactions, while delivering production-ready pages that seamlessly integrated with backend systems, reducing workload by 70%. Took full ownership of managing dashboards and 360 feedback systems, translating Figma designs into robust code. Revamped landing pages using Stitches, aligning with design standards for faster development. Accelerated client onboarding by 50% through a strategic migration from AWS Amplify to Django APIs, revolutionizing process efficiency.

Led the end-to-end development of a full-stack product from scratch using React JS and Node JS, ensuring seamless user experiences. Architected global components that streamlined page development, enhancing code quality and accelerating delivery.

Collaborated directly with the founder to integrate key features like social login, draft lists, and bookmarking, while revamping and enhancing the landing page. Improved existing functionalities, resolved issues, and optimized the codebase to boost overall product performance.

aboutpara: Hello there! I'm Ayush Tripathi, a passionate frontend developer with a keen eye for design and a love for crafting delightful user experiences. One of my primary motivations is creating digital products that users love. I believe that the best user experiences are born when design and functionality work harmoniously, and that is what I strive to achieve in every project. I believe in the power of technology to bring positive change, and I'm driven by the desire to create web interfaces that leave a lasting impression on users. Technology is constantly evolving, and I am a strong advocate of lifelong learning. I stay updated with the latest frontend trends, tools, and best practices to keep my skills sharp.
